summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the functionality of image processing utilities and the end-to-end segmentation pipelines used by the Mask2Former model, covering mask conversion, processor configuration, and post‑processing for instance, semantic, and panoptic outputs.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the image processing components that support Mask2Former‑based computer‑vision solutions, enabling reliable deployment of segmentation services in production environments.
